data.eml:eml: The curious genitalic structures of Tancitares michoacanus (Polydesmida, Rhachodesmidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hoffman, Richard L. (2011): The curious genitalic structures of Tancitares michoacanus (Polydesmida, Rhachodesmidae). International Journal of Myriapodology 5: 27-33, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/ijm.5.1899, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/ijm.5.1899
